Package com.clarionmedia.infinitum.rest.impl

Provides concrete implementations for the RESTful client framework.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    RestfulClientFactory
    Implementation of RestfulClientBuilder for creating new, configured instances of RestfulClient.
    RestfulJsonClient
    A basic implementation of RestfulClient for standard CRUD operations.
    RestfulMapper
    This implementation of ObjectMapper provides methods to map domain models to RESTful web service resources and vice versa.
    RestfulModelMap
    Concrete implementation of ModelMap representing a domain model instance mapped to a RESTful web service resource.
    RestfulXmlClient
    A basic implementation of RestfulClient for standard CRUD operations.
    SharedSecretAuthentication
    Used for token-based/shared-secret authentication.

Package com.clarionmedia.infinitum.rest.impl Description

Provides concrete implementations for the RESTful client framework.
